text:
Hey everybody. Youtube has asked me to take
part in this promotion they're having with
their more prominent youtube channels.

so, I wanted to take a second to thank you
guys for making me one of those channels.

I just started making videos about random
things, to make people laugh and now I'm

a part of this promotion thing for all these
really big musicians and it's all because
of your love and support.
So thank you for that.

So the promotion that youtube has asked me
to take part in, is really all about you guys.

Each artists gets points determined by what
you guys are willing to do.

There are three ways to get points and to
explain those three ways, I had some of my
fans slash family members to explain for me.

number one: subscribe by Selena's channel
by pressing the yellow button.

number two: subscribe to one or all of the
recommended channels.

Number three: share the video on your Facebook
and Twitter pages.

And tell everyone to do steps one, two, and
three. (laughter)
bye, camera.
bye!
The best part is I have 5 prizes to give away.

I'll be giving 5 lucky winners that participate
two tickets to any of my upcoming shows of
my tour in 2011.

Subscribe by Selena's channel by pressing
the yellow button.

I love you guys! and have fun playing the
game!
